name: lab-dash
tagline: A central dashboard for organizing lab links, tools, and status widgets
description: Lab Dash is a dashboard for lab environments and research teams. It aggregates important links, status widgets and notes into a central page, helping labs keep equipment, documents and tools organized and easily accessible.

features.title: Homelab Dashboard
features.description: Display a centralized dashboard for self-hosted services

features.title: Service Links
features.description: Organize links to internal tools and applications

features.title: Icon Support
features.description: Display icons for faster visual identification

features.title: Status Indicators
features.description: Show basic availability status for linked services

features.title: Configuration Files
features.description: Manage dashboard content through configuration files

features.title: Self-Hosted Frontend
features.description: Host the dashboard on your own servers
